mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.genre_id, n.cover, count(*) AS favorite_count FROM user_favorite_tb as uf LEFT JOIN user_tb as u ON uf.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN novel_tb AS n ON uf.novel_id = n.id WHERE gender = #{gender} AND (birth_date > #{leftPort} AND birth_date <= #{rightPort}) GROUP BY novel_id ORDER BY favorite_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT genre_id , count(*) AS genre_count FROM user_favorite_tb AS uf LEFT JOIN novel_tb AS n ON uf.novel_id = n.id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY genre_id ORDER BY genre_count DESC;

SELECT n.id, n.genre_id, n.title, n.cover, count(*) AS favorite_count, score FROM user_favorite_tb AS uf LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON uf.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN novel_tb AS n ON uf.novel_id = n.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ns.novel_id, avg(sc.score) AS score FROM novel_section_tb AS ns LEFT JOIN ( SELECT section_id, avg(score) AS score FROM score_tb GROUP BY section_id ) AS sc ON ns.id = sc.section_id GROUP BY ns.novel_id ) AS sc ON n.id = sc.novel_id WHERE gender = #{gender} AND (birth_date > #{leftPort} AND birth_date <= #{rightPort}) AND uf.user_id != #{userId} GROUP BY uf.novel_id ORDER BY favorite_count LIMIT 50

SELECT n.*, uf.favorite_count, st.name AS service_type_name, g.name AS genre_name FROM novel_tb AS n LEFT JOIN ( SELECT novel_id, count(*) AS favorite_count FROM user_favorite_tb GROUP BY novel_id ) AS uf ON n.id = uf.novel_id LEFT JOIN service_type_tb AS st ON n.service_type_id = st.id LEFT JOIN genre_tb AS g ON n.genre_id = g.id WHERE service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId} ORDER BY favorite_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.*, s.score, g.name AS genre_name FROM novel_tb AS n LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ns.novel_id, avg(score) AS score FROM novel_section_tb AS ns INNER JOIN ( SELECT section_id, avg(score) AS score, COUNT(*) AS count FROM score_tb GROUP BY section_id HAVING count > 2 ) AS s ON ns.id = s.section_id GROUP BY novel_id ) AS s ON n.id = s.novel_id LEFT JOIN genre_tb AS g ON n.genre_id = g.id WHERE service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId} ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT #{limit};

select n.*, g.name as genre_name from novel_tb as n LEFT JOIN user_favorite_tb as uf on n.id = uf.novel_id LEFT JOIN genre_tb as g on n.genre_id = g.id where genre_id = (SELECT g.id FROM user_favorite_tb as uf LEFT JOIN novel_tb as n on uf.novel_id = n.id LEFT JOIN genre_tb as g on n.genre_id = g.id WHERE uf.user_id = 1 GROUP BY genre_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5
